Bakal Bongkar PNS Salah Input Anggaran, Anies Bentuk Tim Ad Hoc
01 Nov 2019, 23:55 by Dwi Andayani
Jakarta - Gubernur DKI Jakarta Anies Baswedan akan memeriksa pegawai yang mengisi anggaran KUA-PPAS 2020. Pegawai yang diperiksa merupakan pegawai yang dianggap melaksanakan tugas dengan asal-asalan.
"Mereka-mereka yang mengerjakannya dengan cara yang seenaknya, akan kami periksa semuanya," ujar Anies di Balai Kota DKI Jakarta, Jl Medan Merdeka Selatan, Jakarta Pusat, Jumat (1/11/2019).
Anies menyebut pemeriksaan akan dilakukan bersama tim ad hoc, untuk pemeriksaan pegawai. Menurutnya, pegawai yang ditemukan melakukan kesalahan dapat dikenakan sanksi.
"Jadi semua yang kerja kemarin dengan cara yang sejadinya asal jadi, asal masuk data kita akan periksa menggunakan ada tim ad hoc untuk pemeriksaan pegawai," kata Anies.
"Mereka semua akan diperiksa. Lalu kalau ditemukan salah, dapat sanksi sesuai dengan yang melanggar," sambungnya.
text:
Will Unloading PNS Incorrect Budget Input, Anies Forms an Ad Hoc Team
01 Nov 2019, 23:55 by Dwi Andayani
Jakarta - DKI Jakarta Governor Anies Baswedan will examine employees who fill the 2020 KUA-PPAS budget. The employees examined are employees who are considered to carry out their duties carelessly.
"Those who do it the way they want, we will check everything," said Anies at the Jakarta City Hall, Jl Medan Merdeka Selatan, Central Jakarta, Friday (11/01/2019).
Anies said that the inspection would be conducted with an ad hoc team, for employee inspection. According to him, employees who are found wrong can be penalized.
"So all who worked yesterday in the original way, as long as we enter the data, we will check using an ad hoc team for employee inspection," said Anies.
"They will all be examined. Then if found wrong, can be sanctioned according to those who violate," he continued.
